Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC) is a promising energy conversion device for power generation using solid carbon fuel.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: In this paper, a 2D model is developed for a tubular DC-SOFC for CO and electricity co-generation.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: Parametric simulations are conducted to understand the physical/chemical processes in the DC-SOFC.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: Good performance of DC-SOFC is observed even at a large distance between the carbon bed and the porous anode, indicating the feasibility of large-scale DC-SOFC applications.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: The DC-SOFC performance is found to decrease with decreasing temperature due to the decreased Boudouard reaction kinetics.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: It's also found that the molar fraction of CO at the anode can be well controlled by adjusting the operating conditions, enabling DC-SOFC for electricity and CO cogeneration.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: Another finding is that the current density in the DC-SOFC increases slightly along the cell length, which is different from the H-2-fueled SOFC.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: In addition, the anode-supported configuration is found to be beneficial in improving the electrical output of the DC-SOFC but is unfavorable for CO generation.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: A small D-ce and a high potential are recommended to improve CO generation from the DC-SOFC.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration

Sentencas: The model can be used for design optimization of DC-SOFC at a system level.
Titulo: Modeling of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell for CO and electricity cogeneration
